This test ensures WebGL implementations handle bool uniforms in a OpenGL ES 2.0 spec compliant way

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


NOTE: Some OpenGL drivers do not handle this correctly

Checking gl.uniform1f with bool.
PASS getError was expected value: NO_ERROR : should be able to set bool with gl.uniform1f

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
